Description: Failed to ensure that there were sufficient people with suitable competence to carry out safely in the event of a reasonably foreseeable emergency in that you failed to provide a standby diver.  Failed to ensure that before the commencement of the diving project a diving project plan was prepared.  Failed to ensure that all divers taking part in diving project had a valid certificate of medical fitness to dive.  Failed to ensure that a suitably qualified diving supervisor was appointed.  Failed to ensure that young person employee was protected at work from any risks to his health or safety.  Failed to insure under one or more approved policies with an authorised insurer or insurers, against liability for bodily injury or disease sustained by employees arising out of and in the course of their employment.  Risk assessment control measure for a diver becoming separated form surface vessel were not in place
